approvePublicTrading(uint256,bool).details: Allows or prevents NFT to be traded on other marketplaces. Public trading will be allowed after the initial sale on Nidhi's marketplace. This ensures that every Nidhi NFT has an intrinsic value.

burn(uint256).details: Burns the token, removes all its stored data and also ensures that references to it are removed from the Nidhi marketplace.

createToken(string,string,string).details: Creates a new token with the provided name, description and image URI. Upon successful completion, the `TokenCreated` event will be emitted.

creatorOf(uint256).details: Returns the address of the creator of the provided token id.
